item.title: Court blocks release of hundreds of immigrants arrested in Chicago-area crackdown
item.description: A federal appeals court has blocked the immediate release of hundreds of immigrants detained during a Chicago-area immigration crackdown

item.title: Church nativity scenes add zip ties, gas masks and ICE to protest immigration raids
item.description: Nativity scenes at some churches are sparking fierce debates

item.title: Abrego Garcia won release from detention. He must check in with immigration officials 14 hours later
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia was due to check-in with immigration authorities less than 14 hours after he was released from detention on a judgeâ€™s orders

item.title: Immigration crackdown leaves teens to care for siblings after parents get detained
item.description: An immigration crackdown in Louisiana has forced some teenagers to grow up fast after their parents were arrested by federal agents

item.title: Closing arguments expected in murder trial of Brian Walshe over wife's disappearance
item.description: Closing arguments are expected Friday in the murder trial of Brian Walshe in connection with the disappearance of his wife Ana
